Package it.polimi.se2018.controller.network.client

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CommUtilizer
    The interface used to push events coming from the network layer
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ClientDiscTimer
    Fallback class that ensures a graceful disconnect should the network fail abruptly
    ClientDiscTimerTest
    Tester class for the Client disconnection timer
    Comm
    The object representing the network interface
    CommFE
    Represents the Client Front End of the network architecture
    CommFETest
    Tester class for the client comm front-end
    CommLayer
    Represents a generic client network layer
    CommTest
    Tester class for the client Comm
    InListener
    Processes all the inbound objects on one stream
    InListenerTest
    Tester class for the client inbound listener
    OutQueueEmptier
    Processes the outgoing objects of a stream
    OutQueueEmptierTest
    Tester class for the client outbound process
    ReconnectWaker
    Object that tries to reconnect if the network fails
    ReconnectWakerTest
    Tester class for the reconnect timer
    RMIClientListener
    An active listener that extracts incoming objects from the RMI session object
    RMIClientListenerTest
    Tester class for the RMI client Listener
    RMICommLayer
    A RMI implementation of the client network layer
    RMICommLayerTest
    Tester class for the client RMI layer
    SocketCommLayer
    A socket implementation of the client network layer
    SocketCommLayerTest
    Tester class for the socket client layer
    SocketInQueueFiller
    A listener that extracts incoming objects from a SafeSocket
    SocketInQueueFillerTest
    Tester class for the client inbound listener
